name: LaTisha Foster
text: Service is always good. Food is sometimes off, but good 98%of the time. I have been ordering from here since they opened the doors.

name: Hannah Lowe
text: I’ve been ordering almost everyday! Lol but I have enjoyed everything I’ve gotten nothing wrong and the drivers are nice! :) I will recommend!

name: Kenyetta Upshaw
text: THE ABSOLUTE WORST PIZZA HUT EVER....VERY TIME WE COME TO THIS RESTAURANT THERE'S SOMETHING WRONG WITH THE ORDER. ITS NEVER READY WHEN THEY SAY IT WILL BE.... ENCOURAGE EVERYONE TO EXPECT BETTER SERVICE THAN THIS! I've said before this will be my last and with everything in me I WONT BE BACK!

name: Debra McMahan
text: Worst pizza I have ever had. A froven pizza has more flavor then their pizza. Order was wrong. I had asked for garlic crust, pepperoni, sausage, beef, and extra sauce. I did not get any beef, no garlic crust, and the sauce is a joke. I …More

name: Mari Yates
text: Love their pizza and breadsticks...but this location is extremely slow with their deliveries. They will tell you 30 min, but you better plan on it being more like 1 hr. They have done it every single time I have ordered from them.

name: Chad Chavez
text: Very very very very poor! The worst customer service imaginable not to mention the worst Food available on today's market you might as well try s*** before you eat at this place!!!

name: T Smith
text: I ordered the holiday box 2 pan pizzas. I paid extra for the cheese sticks. When I recieved my order, after almost a hour, the pizza was warm, it wasn't pan, and I had regular breadsticks. There was no number on the receipt so I looked it …More

name: Patricia Jenkins
text: Terrible pizza.  Two orders of breadsticks cost as much of the skinny assume supreme pizza I received.  Close Your Doors. The pizza sucks!

name: Maika 08
text: Service sucks so bad had to wait an hr for my order when my receipt said it would be ready in 15 mins. No-one was in front of us and they even said that were having a slow day with only 8 customers thus far.  Pizza should have bn ready at …More

name: Marcus Blakemore
text: I love the pan with garlic butter.

name: Heather Sharp
text:
This is the worst service and Pizza Hut ever !!!!!
They were an hour and a half late on their delivery time.   The pizza was wrong so I called the manager and he refused to help me.   Don't ever use this place !!!!!!!!!!

name: Joseph Austin
text: This is the worst Pizza Hut I have ever ordered from.   They said my pizza should be delivered in 45 min and 2-1/2 hours later and 3 calls the pizza finally showed up WRONG!!!!!! …More

text: Ms Lauren hooked me up your shout

text: Bought 2 large pizzas from this place the crust was so Brown it looked burnt maybe if the employees stayed inside more than on the outside they could make orders right

text: This Pizza Hut is terrible they steal your card info and buy stuff for themselves!!! Don't deliver from them with a card or your hard working money is gone period!!!!! #stealers
